title.narrative: Saneamento Basico da Bacia Estrada Nova - PROMABEN II
Saneamiento Básico de la Cuenca Estrada Nova PROMABEN II
Sanitation for Nova Estrada Watershed - PROMABEN II

description.narrative: El Propósito del PROMABEN II es de contribuir a resolver el problema ambiental y social que afecta a los habitantes de la Cuenca Estrada Nova por medio de acciones y obras en los canales Caripunas y Bernardo Sayão. Sus objetivos específicos son: i) mejorar las condiciones ambientales y de salud en la zona; ii) mejorar las condiciones de vivienda de la población residente en la zona; iii) aumentar la capacidad operativa y de gestión de las entidades involucradas; iv) ampliar la vía Orla en la margen del Río Guama. El PROMABEN II completará la ejecución del PROMABEN (o PROMABEN I), financiado con recursos del préstamo 1998/OC-BR, de manera a garantizar el total cumplimiento de sus objetivos, además de seguir adelante con el Projeto Vía Orla e implantar el primer puerto fluvial ¿Porto do Açai¿.

The purpose of PROMABEN II is to contribute towards the solving of environmental and social issues affecting the inhabitants of the Estrada Nova Watershed through interventions of Caripunas and Bernardo sayao canals. Its specific objectives are: i) improve the environmental and health situation in the intervention area; ii) improve the habitat of the population in the area; iii) improve the operation and management capacity of the public entities involved; extend the Via Orla on the Guama riverside. PROMABEN II will complement the actions of 1998/OC-BR, in order to meet its objectives in their integrality, aditionaly to giving continuity to the Via Orla Project and implementing the Porto Acai.
Commitment in fourth quarter of 2014
Disbursement in second quarter of 2018
Disbursement in second quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2018
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2021
